title: Encode the Google Maps Uri
message:
Encode the Google Maps Uri

Intent works better when the query is encoded.
https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/android-api/intents#uri_encoded_query_strings

Signed-off-by: Jamie Adkins <jamieadkins95@gmail.com>
